title: Ep 371 | Why Many Take Time to Find Their Faith & the Steps You Take Before You Walk on Water
description:
Jase and Al discuss why so many people take time to come to Jesus. Phil points out that even a few disciples didn’t believe until they saw the tomb. Jase looks at why Jesus walking on water was just as miraculous as turning water into wine. The guys get into why you should trust doctors who are taught by God. Jase and Al share their amazing experiences with Make-A-Wish kids and why Si is the best at being himself in difficult situations. And Jase spells out why you have to get into the boat and discover who Jesus is before you walk on water.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
